column1: Effective firm poised. Excellent job @KamalaHarris.

Justice Ginsburg championed the issues that made our country a more perfect union. She served our country tirelessly & until the very end of her life. We mourn her loss & we celebrate her legacy & her immense contributions to American society. Rest in peace Justice Ginsburg.

I’m excited to moderate a wonderful panel of experts today with @DrBiden and @LULAC! We’ll be discussing health care and COVID-19 in the Latino community with @DrBiden @FilemonVela @amirasequeira and Dr. Robert Rodriguez! Tune in for this conversation! #LULAC https://t.co/tvDd6jFPY7
Nobody knows better than @JoeBiden what it takes to be VP. His choice of @KamalaHarris is the right one for America. She is qualified and ready to lead alongside @JoeBiden on Day 1! #BidenHarris2020

🇺🇸Today’s 4th of July isn't less meaningful as we express our hope & love for each other by social distancing wearing a mask. We will get through this together! Let’s keep each other healthy & celebrate safely! Happy 4th of July! Enjoy some photos of past 4th of July parades! https://t.co/JJ3PDkrGcT

Masks save lives plain and simple. Face coverings are one small way we can work as a community to stop the spread of #COVID19. @realDonaldTrump can lead by example and help save American lives.  https://t.co/OYNfK1ee1L

🏳️‍🌈Happy Pride! Today is the 50th anniversary of the 1st Pride Parade! This year we aren’t marching in person but we are united in spirit. Let’s reflect on our progress & continue the fight for justice & equality. Together we are making America a more perfect Union! ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜

Being a father is difficult but the most rewarding calling in life. Today we honor all the hardworking and loving fathers and guardians who strive every day and care for their families. Some are with us and some are not. Today we celebrate them all. Happy Fathers’ Day! https://t.co/2QOIRSb290
On #Juneteenth we commemorate the end of slavery in the U.S. and we recommit ourselves to continue to fight for freedom justice and equality.

I stand w/ #DACA recipient Dreamers. Today we celebrate SCOTUS decision protecting #DACA. Tomorrow we continue to fight for a legislative fix & demand Sen. McConnell stop playing politics & allow a vote on the House-passed American Dream and Promise Act NOW! #SiSePuede #YesWeCan

Today's SCOTUS ruling affirms what we already know: discriminating against LGBTQ individuals in the workplace is wrong. Period.   Supreme Court grants federal job protections to gay lesbian transgender workers https://t.co/MGB2SroCYr via @mydesert

I'm fighting to ensure veterans & servicemembers exposed to toxic military #burnpits get the health care and benefits they desperately need. Veterans CANNOT wait & we cannot allow toxic burn pits to be our generation's Agent Orange. @burnpits360 #burnpits https://t.co/Aq2xBbt8Hm

Today and everyday we honor and remember the brave men and women of our #ArmedForces who have sacrificed their lives for each one of us. Join me in lifting them and their families up in our prayers and let us honor their sacrifice. #MemorialDay https://t.co/VNNkmYFnKo

Happy Mother’s Day! Today we celebrate all the mothers who have held our families together especially during challenging times. They are models of strength and hope to us all. Let's all celebrate safely today! #mothersday2020 https://t.co/2AvkS8Dbyc

Today starts #NationalNursesWeek! TY to all nurses. Your fight against the pandemic whether working with you in the ER or alongside you in the poorest communities is heroic. You need more PPE protection from the virus. I will continue to fight for you & all frontline workers. https://t.co/tHagBz5hJZ
To all who are celebrating Ramadan Mubarak! May all who observe this holy month find peace hope and happiness. #RamadanMubarak

🗳I’m proud to mail in my ballot in support of Elizabeth Romero for CA State Senate! I’m supporting Liz because we need her leadership now more than ever. Every vote will matter so join me and mail in your ballot by the May 12 special election and ✅VOTE FOR ELIZABETH ROMERO! https://t.co/43v6lWhBz3

Celebrating Earth Day during this pandemic reminds us just how intertwined our health is to our environment. We need to continue fighting climate change to protect our national treasures for future generations. Our health depends on it. Happy 50th Anniversary of Earth Day! https://t.co/I4FSAILYsP

I’m live talking about #COVID19 and it’s impacts on our communities live with ⁦@MyDesert⁩. Join me! Ask me anything: Rep. Raul Ruiz to field coronavirus questions online https://t.co/ejwsPiy3nI via @MyDesert

Every day the #USPostalService delivers essential goods keeps families connected and employs hundreds of thousands of hardworking Americans. It's a lifeline for communities across the nation and we can't abandon it now. #SaveUSPS #USPS_is_essential  https://t.co/FSVqNKc2wB

Wishing all those who are celebrating a safe and happy Easter Sunday! May we share in the blessings and joy of new beginnings that we celebrate today and know the hope of a healthier & brighter future to come! #Easter2020 #SaferAtHome https://t.co/Ze4rsCcFw5

Chag Sameach to everyone observing Pesach! Wishing you all a meaningful Passover. I hope you are able to celebrate with family over Zoom or in your household. Next year together in person! שָׂמֵחַ חַג https://t.co/sSbOj9uNB8

As a doctor serving in Congress I called on the Trump Administration from the beginning to take rapid & aggressive action that will slow the spread of the virus and save lives. We still have a ways to go. Working together I know we can get through this. https://t.co/GQXc8htwWR

I’m humbled by your support tonight! If you believe in protecting Medicare & Social Security fighting for middle class families LGBTQ & women's rights fighting for climate justice & standing up for veterans then join us! It is an honor to have you by my side! https://t.co/PeAcRGczYL
